name: Deep Down (itch) (lilithisa)
description:
Find your way across a deserted wasteland at the bottom of the ocean and uncover the truth of your exile.

Credits:

  • Simona Beck - Project Management & UI/2D Art
  • Emilia Bornschlegl - 3D Art
  • River Robin Gadermaier - Programming/UI
  • Benedict Haunschmied - Level Design
  • Lilith-Isa Samer- Story & Sound, 2D Art

Special Thanks to Ted Grimes for providing the Plant Shader.
